Package etm.contrib.integration.web

Generic Web Application integration support.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
EtmMonitorContextListener The EtmMonitorContextListener configures and starts an EtmMonitor using an XmlEtmConfigurator.
HttpConsoleServlet A servlet that renders aggregated EtmMonitor results.
HttpRequestPerformanceFilter A Servlet Filter that spans performance monitoring around HTTP requests.
SoapActionPerformanceFilter A Servlet Filter that spans performance monitoring around WebService document/literal requests that contain a SoapAction HTTP header.
 

Package etm.contrib.integration.web Description

Generic Web Application integration support. Use EtmMonitorContextListener to enable performance monitoring for an web application. In order to measure performance of HTTP requests use one of the provided filters.
